[Home](./index.md) &gt; [fmt-subs](./fmt-subs.md) &gt; [fmt](./fmt-subs.fmt.md)

## fmt variable

Tag function for template literals which wraps its contents into a [Fmt](./fmt-subs.fmt.md) instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fmt: FmtFn
```

## Remarks

Use [sub()](./fmt-subs.sub.md) for values substitution

## Example


```ts
// Simple usage
console.log(...fmt`Hey, ${fmt.sub('Buddy', '%s')}!`.assemble())

// Nesting fmts to each other
const part1 = fmt`Foo: ${fmt.sub({ foo: true }, '%o')}`
const part2 = fmt`Bar: ${fmt.sub({ bar: false }, '%o')}`
console.log(...fmt`Part 2: ${part2}\nPart 1: ${part1}`.assemble())
```
